name: BoomFlow
description:
Addictive way to spend your time. Chain the combos! Trigger da boom! Absorb points! Rinse and Repeat!


CONTROLS:

Mouse movement     . . . . . . .    rotates the player

Mouse left button     . . . . . . .    boost your speed!

ESC or P to pause

HOTFIX(14SEPT21)

Gamebreaking bug fixed - showing leaderboards after login broke the game

-intro not playing fix

-unity WebGL build mouse sensitivity bug fix

(Original competition version still available via download below)

GAMEPLAY:

Connect the nodes of the same colour, if you break a chain by connecting a different colour, you trigger the explosion and earn points.

You have limited time to connect the nodes, if you run out - it's game over.

Hello! Enjoy playing my first game ever, that I've actually finished... ! 

This masterpiece was crafted in around 2 days for AZURE GAME JAM  themed CHAIN REACTION hosted by Lana Lux and Microsoft Azure. It was a bumpy, if not turbulent ride, but it was worth it! I didn't sleep. Still worth it. It is a simple, endless (if you can game), connect the nodes and blow them up kind of game. You can even compete in leaderboards via a PlayFab account. However it is not required and you can play as guest without the need to log in or creating an account.
